Name: Down Fast VR
About the game: Down Fast VR is a mountain bike VR arcade game which lets you control the bike utilizing your headset and controllers. Unique VR controll brings you the feeling of controlling your bike. ASYNC MULTIPLAYER RACE Race against other people's ghost to beat the leaderboards for each race FREERIDE DO STUNTS Do whips using your hands You can be creative and do some walrides CHOOSE YOUR BIKE
